description: The Ninja, coming off her first defeat ever, is ready to take on the undefeated Dragon. The Ninja is giving up about 30lb in weight, however the Dragon is fighting the tail end of a nasty flu. This is what US is all about--hard work and sacrifice, toughness and grit. Who won? Who got fucked HARD by the winner? Who was moaning like a slut at the end of a big dildo? Join and find out.
title: The Ninja (8-1) vs. The Dragon (5-0)
